name: ElectriKitty
description:
OVERVIEW

Play as a cat on journey through ancient ruins in this 2D platformer game. Explore this dangerous world and master the mystic power of electricity and magnetism. Use your abilities to collect rings and solve puzzles as you make your way through the ruins.

CONTROLS

Press these buttons....
